name: ThePodgecast
0:
”Alexa, open The Podge Cast”
”Alexa, ask The Podge Cast for the latest talk”
”Alexa, start The Podge Cast”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: the podge cast
des: Two seemingly meaningless people talking about very meaningful things. A hodgepodge of Christian topics from what we've been learning as Christians or spouses or parents or well just about anything. We're a pastor and his wife and we just want to glorify God in any avenue we can. We hope this podgecast of topics will grow you in your love of the Lord.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
